<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug description</denchmark-h>
Recent PR on the change of mp.spawn by mp.start_process brakes compatibility with PyTorch 1.3.1 and 1.4.0 versions. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/actions?query=workflow%3A.github%2Fworkflows%2Fpytorch-version-tests.yml>https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/actions?query=workflow%3A.github%2Fworkflows%2Fpytorch-version-tests.yml</denchmark-link>
We have to fix that.
